thread.title: Questor share tip: Avoid Oil services until prices fully recover
thread.title_full: Questor share tip: Avoid Oil services until prices fully recover

author: John Ficenec
title: Questor share tip: Avoid Oil services until prices fully recover
text: Questor Questor share tip: Avoid Oil services until prices fully recover A short lived oil rally is no reason to buy bombed out oil services stocks on the cheap, says Questor Wood Group said that there had been a drop-off in drilling activity in the North Sea since the Government increased taxes on oil and gas revenue Photo: Rex Features By John Ficenec , Questor Editor 3:32PM BST 10 Oct 2015
